00050 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_WEIGHTSUM_H
00051 #define CONSTRAINT_WEIGHTSUM_H
00052 
00053 #include "constraint_sum.h"
00054  
00055 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00056 AbstractConstraint*
00057 BuildCT_WEIGHTLEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, vector<T1> vec, const vector<T2>& t2, ConstraintBlob& b)
00058 {
00059   vector<int> scale = b.constants[0];
00060   // Preprocess to remove any multiplications by 0, both for efficency
00061   // and correctness
00062   if(scale.size() != vec.size())
00063   {
00064     FAIL_EXIT("In a weighted sum constraint, the vector of weights must have the same length to the vector of variables.");
00065   }
00066   for(unsigned i = 0; i < scale.size(); ++i)
00067   {
00068     if(scale[i] == 0)
00069     {
00070       scale.erase(scale.begin() + i);
00071       vec.erase(vec.begin() + i);
00072       --i; // So we don't miss an element.
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   BOOL multipliers_size_one = true;
00077   for(unsigned i = 0; i < scale.size(); ++i)
00078   {
00079     if(scale[i] != 1 && scale[i] != -1)
00080     {
00081       multipliers_size_one = false;
00082       i = scale.size();
00083     }
00084   }
00085 
00086   if(multipliers_size_one)
00087   {
00088     vector<SwitchNeg<T1> > mult_vars(vec.size());
00089     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00090       mult_vars[i] = SwitchNeg<T1>(vec[i], scale[i]);
00091     return BuildCT_LEQSUM(stateObj, mult_vars, t2, b);
00092   }
00093   else
00094   {
00095     vector<MultiplyVar<T1> > mult_vars(vec.size());
00096     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00097       mult_vars[i] = MultiplyVar<T1>(vec[i], scale[i]);
00098     return BuildCT_LEQSUM(stateObj, mult_vars, t2, b);
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 // Don't pass in the vectors by reference, as we might need to copy them.
00103 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00104 AbstractConstraint*
00105 BuildCT_WEIGHTGEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, vector<T1> vec, const vector<T2>& t2, ConstraintBlob& b)
00106 {
00107   vector<int> scale = b.constants[0];
00108   // Preprocess to remove any multiplications by 0, both for efficency
00109   // and correctness
00110   if(scale.size() != vec.size())
00111   {
00112     FAIL_EXIT("In a weighted sum constraint, the vector of weights must have the same length as the vector of variables.");
00113   }
00114   for(unsigned i = 0; i < scale.size(); ++i)
00115   {
00116     if(scale[i] == 0)
00117     {
00118       scale.erase(scale.begin() + i);
00119       vec.erase(vec.begin() + i);
00120       --i; // So we don't miss an element.
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   BOOL multipliers_size_one = true;  
00125   for(unsigned i = 0; i < scale.size(); ++i)
00126   {
00127     if(scale[i] != 1 && scale[i] != -1)
00128     {
00129       multipliers_size_one = false;
00130       i = scale.size();
00131     }
00132   }
00133 
00134   if(multipliers_size_one)
00135   {
00136     vector<SwitchNeg<T1> > mult_vars(vec.size());
00137     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00138       mult_vars[i] = SwitchNeg<T1>(vec[i], scale[i]);
00139     return BuildCT_GEQSUM(stateObj, mult_vars, t2, b);
00140   }
00141   else
00142   {
00143     vector<MultiplyVar<T1> > mult_vars(vec.size());
00144     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00145       mult_vars[i] = MultiplyVar<T1>(vec[i], scale[i]);
00146     return BuildCT_GEQSUM(stateObj, mult_vars, t2, b);
00147   }
00148 }
